title: Hidden latin chars in a japanese game
content:
Original length:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182213im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ninokuni_font12_latin_only_3684.png)

Zoomed:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182213im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ninokuni_font12_latin_only_big_3625.png)

Hi experts,

The Japanese Ninokuni for Nintendo DS use some NDS fonts.  
In one of these japanese fonts, the 12 pixels one, i have found some latin chars, that the game doesn't use.

The 'b', 'd', 'f' or 'l' look like a serif curved font, but the capital ones don't.  
Does Nintendo buy/convert a well known ttf font for the game ?  
I want to find closest fonts for a website.

thanks in advance.

Font: 

 http://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/harvest\_moon\_friends\_of\_mineral\_town 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182213/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: ouioui2003

comments.content:
This looks a bitmap font. Letters are 11 pixels high by 5 pixels wide. You can search for bitmap fonts at Dafont, among other places.

- Mike Yanega

Seems to be a match but standard Latin character set only.  
FontShop/FontStruct/Harvest Moon - Friends of Mineral Town Regular  
 [http://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/harvest\_moon\_friends\_of\_mineral\_town](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182213/http:/fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/harvest_moon_friends_of_mineral_town)
